attributes.action: Do not increase National Insurance contributions to fund Social Care
attributes.additional_details: National Insurance is only paid by those under the state pension age. It does not seem right that this is the type of tax chosen by the government to pay for the much needed investment in social care.
attributes.background: Choose a way to pay for social care that does not single out those under pension age

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596514
